nodes.text: Tool kits were collections of tools carried by mechanics or stored aboard starships. The Nihil pirates Gwishi and Klinith Da carried tool kits while infiltrating the Steady Wing disguised as mechanics to sabotage it. After the attack, Avon Starros, one of the few survivors, found goggles and the scout droid SD-7 in the tool kit aboard the maintenance shuttle she had escaped in.
